info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 17 at 4:13AM CDT until August 17 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Chicago IL
info.description:
FFWLOT
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Kane County in northeastern Illinois... Northeastern Kendall County in northeastern Illinois... West Central Will County in northeastern Illinois...
* Until 615 AM CDT.
* At 413 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing torrential rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Significant flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Significant flash flooding.
SOURCE...Automated rain gauges.
IMPACT...Rapid-onset, significant flooding of creeks, streams, drainage ditches, low-lying areas, and poor drainage areas. Widespread street and underpass flooding. Possible flooding of structures. Possible flooding of highways.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Aurora, Joliet, Naperville, Bolingbrook, Romeoville, Plainfield, Oswego, Lockport, Yorkville, Crest Hill, Montgomery, Shorewood, Sugar Grove, Boulder Hill, Fairmont, Rockdale, Crystal Lawns and Bristol.
info.instruction: A Flash Flood Warning means rapid-onset flooding is imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along creeks, drainage ditches, and other waterways should take immediate precautions to protect life and property.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 6:15 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 6:15 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Kane, IL; Kendall, IL; Will, IL

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:15 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:15 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
